title: New Gaza ceasefire efforts as safe zones shrink | Video | 2news.com
text: Amid a new push for a ceasefire, thousands of Gazans are fleeing to shrinking safe zones. Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save Watch 2 News 2 Weather Alerts See All > Weather Alert ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR THE SIERRA FRONT... * CHANGES...No changes. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 420 Northern Sierra Front including Carson City, Douglas, Storey, Southern Washoe, Western Lyon and and Far Southern Lassen Counties. * Winds...Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. Localized higher gusts to 40 mph in wind prone areas. * Humidity...13 to 18% * Duration...2 to 5 hours. * Impacts...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity can cause fire to rapidly grow in size and intensity before first responders can contain them. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Avoid outdoor activities that can cause a spark near dry vegetation, such as yard work, target shooting, or campfires. Follow local fire restrictions. Check weather.gov/reno for updates and livingwithfire.info for preparedness tips. && ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PDT FRIDAY FOR WASHOE LAKE... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph for Washoe Lake. * WHERE...Washoe Lake * WHEN...Until 5 PM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind. && Currently in Reno 84° Sunny84° / 54° 4 PM 84° 5 PM 82° 6 PM 78° 7 PM 74° 8 PM 70° © Copyright 2024 KTVN 4925 Energy Way, Reno, NV | Terms of Use | Privacy Policy Powered by BLOX Content Management System from BLOX Digital. {{title}} {{summary}} Notifications Settings You don't have any notifications.
